title: BLADE.ARCUS.from.Shining.Battle.Arena-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Blade Arcus from Shining: Battle Arena (c) Studio Saizensen

Release Date :  07/2016              Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Action

In a world controlled by blade, magic, and  fist  diverse  warriors
gather for battle! This is a 2D fighting game  featuring characters
from Shining Blade and Shining Hearts. Featuring: Tag  Battle  with
16 playable characters Beautiful artwork by  TonyAlbionWorks  Story
Mode with full voice acting Hone your skills in  Traning  Mode!  Go
head to head with your friends in Versus Mode!

For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/446040/

- Extract
- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play

General Notes:
- Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online ..
- If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
